hero.name: Abdulbosit Abdurahimov
hero.title: I build things for the web.
hero.description: I'm a Java Backend developer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I’m focused on building robust and scalable backend systems.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hello! My name is Abdulbosit and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2023 when I decided to try building a Telegram bot — turns out hacking together a custom little app taught me a lot about Java and backend systems!
about.paragraph2: Fast-forward to today, I’ve had the privilege of working on several challenging projects. My main focus these days is building robust and scalable backend systems for our clients.
about.skillsTitle: Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

projects.title: Things I’ve Built
projects.olx_desc: A robust backend system for a classifieds platform, inspired by the popular OLX website. Features secure REST API endpoints for user management, advertisements, and messaging.
projects.education_desc: An e-learning platform backend empowering instructors to manage courses and video content. Includes an interactive Telegram bot. *Note: The bot uses test data.*
projects.oromland_desc: Contributed to a private startup project to create a platform for sanatoriums and camps. As a closed-source project, the code repository is not public.

contact.subtitle: 04. What's Next?
contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.paragraph: Although I’m not currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I’ll do my best to get back to you!
